event.description: Jose Siri singles on a fly ball to right fielder Scott Schebler.
With Shed Long batting, Amir Garrett picks off Jose Siri at 1st on throw to Joey Votto.
Shed Long grounds out to first baseman Joey Votto.
Taylor Trammell doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Jesse Winker strikes out swinging.
Taylor Sparks called out on strikes.
Brantley Bell singles on a line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Cassidy Brown grounds into a double play, pitcher Amir Garrett to second baseman Jose Peraza to first baseman Joey Votto. Brantley Bell out at 2nd.
Alfredo Rodriguez flies out to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Tyler Stephenson strikes out swinging.
Jose Siri grounds out, third baseman Scooter Gennett to first baseman Joey Votto.
Pitching Change: Wandy Peralta replaces Amir Garrett.
Shed Long grounds out, pitcher Wandy Peralta to first baseman Joey Votto.
Taylor Trammell called out on strikes.
Jesse Winker strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Beau Amaral replaces center fielder Billy Hamilton, batting 1st, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Patrick Kivlehan replaces right fielder Scott Schebler, batting 6th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Zach Vincej replaces shortstop Zack Cozart, batting 7th, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Stuart Turner replaces catcher Tucker Barnhart, batting 8th, playing catcher.

Taylor Sparks strikes out swinging.
Brantley Bell doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Beau Amaral.
Cassidy Brown hit by pitch.

Gavin LaValley grounds out, shortstop Zach Vincej to first baseman Joey Votto.
Seth Mejias-Brean remains in the game as the third baseman.
